## Description {#details}

API for tracking metadata references through RAUW and deletion.

Shared API for updating <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/metadata">Metadata</a></em> pointers in subclasses that support RAUW.

This API is not meant to be used directly. See <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/trackingmdref">TrackingMDRef</a></em> for a user-friendly tracking reference.

Definition at line 308 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/metadata-h">Metadata.h</a>.

### retrack() {#a80df62c7fe69bd81d3f2ecd843d0db92}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool llvm::MetadataTracking::retrack (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/metadata">Metadata</a> &#42;&amp; MD, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/metadata">Metadata</a> &#42;&amp; New)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
Move tracking from one reference to another.

Semantically equivalent to <code>untrack(MD)</code> followed by <code>track(New)</code>, except that ownership callbacks are maintained.

Note: it is an error if <code>&#42;MD</code> does not equal <code>New</code>.


<SectionUser title="Returns">
true iff tracking is supported by <code>MD</code>.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/metadata-h/#l00364">364</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/metadata-h">Metadata.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### retrack() {#a168c95e63d349b2b34821da321f20bb8}

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/metadata-h/#l00367">367</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/metadata-h">Metadata.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/metadata-cpp/#l00231">231</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/metadata-cpp">Metadata.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### track() {#ac8d18d3d41665a4f2747c2da7195055a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool llvm::MetadataTracking::track (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/metadata">Metadata</a> &#42;&amp; MD)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
Track the reference to metadata.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> <code>MD</code> with <code>&#42;MD</code>, if the subclass supports tracking. If <code>&#42;MD</code> gets RAUW&#39;ed, <code>MD</code> will be updated to the new address. If <code>&#42;MD</code> gets deleted, <code>MD</code> will be set to <code>nullptr</code>.

If tracking isn&#39;t supported, <code>&#42;MD</code> will not change.


<SectionUser title="Returns">
true iff tracking is supported by <code>MD</code>.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/metadata-h/#l00319">319</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/metadata-h">Metadata.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### track() {#ad35867ebcbacce31990adc61d7679f9a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool llvm::MetadataTracking::track (void &#42; Ref, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/metadata">Metadata</a> &amp; MD, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/metadata">Metadata</a> &amp; Owner)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
Track the reference to metadata for <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/metadata">Metadata</a></em>.

As <em><a href="#ac8d18d3d41665a4f2747c2da7195055a">track(Metadata&#42;&amp;)</a></em>, but with support for calling back to <code>Owner</code> to tell it that its operand changed. This could trigger <code>Owner</code> being re-uniqued.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/metadata-h/#l00328">328</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/metadata-h">Metadata.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
Track the reference to metadata for <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/metadataasvalue">MetadataAsValue</a></em>.

As <em><a href="#ac8d18d3d41665a4f2747c2da7195055a">track(Metadata&#42;&amp;)</a></em>, but with support for calling back to <code>Owner</code> to tell it that its operand changed. This could trigger <code>Owner</code> being re-uniqued.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/metadata-h/#l00337">337</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/metadata-h">Metadata.h</a>.

Stop tracking a reference to metadata.

Stops <code>&#42;MD</code> from tracking <code>MD</code>.
